legal_basis: Section 18.4(2) of the Federal Courts Act
application_details: motion for conversion, examination of additional witnesses, and amendments to the application
result_of_case: Motion denied; case to proceed as judicial review without amendments or additional examinations
cause_of_action: Dispute over DIAND's decision to appoint a third-party manager for financial mismanagement
procedure_followed: Judicial review application filed; motion for conversion, witness examination, and amendments sought
